title: Manage Intermodal Gate Congestion
description: The system detects long wait times for trucks at an intermodal terminal's entry gate. A manager must take action.

tasks.description: Receive a system alert that the average gate queue time has exceeded 30 minutes.
tasks.expected_outcome: The manager is alerted to the congestion problem.

tasks.description: Check the status of the gate processing systems and staffing levels.
tasks.expected_outcome: Manager sees that one of the two entry lanes is closed due to a hardware failure.

tasks.description: Dispatch an IT technician to repair the broken gate hardware.
tasks.expected_outcome: A technician is sent to fix the issue.

tasks.description: Temporarily re-route some inbound trucks to a secondary, less-used gate to alleviate pressure.
tasks.expected_outcome: Gate traffic is redirected to reduce the queue.
